title: Study of Vaccine safety
author: Sumitraj Pagare Follow
description: First vaccine was developed by "Edward Jenner" in 1796 for Smallpox. 1. Cutter incident - 1955 (Polio virus) 2. Simian virus 40(SV 40)- 1955-1963 3. HPV Vac...
cleaned_text: A vaccine is a biological preparation that improves immunity to a particular Disease. No vaccine is completely safe or completely effective, while all known vaccine adverse events are minor and self limited, some vaccine have been associated with rare but serious health effects.
